snippet.title: Acts of Blood - Steam Demo Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
Hello everyone, 👋
First, we’d like to thank you for supporting Acts of Blood. 

We're excited to Announce that the Demo build for Acts of Blood is Live now.🔴
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3031890/Acts_of_Blood/
About Acts of Blood:
Acts of Blood is a fast paced and intense action beat 'em up game, with a strong focus on hand-to-hand combat and using weapons to take down enemies. There's also Destructible environments, melee and firearms weapon choices, and basic parkour movements.

What you can expect on the Demo build:
Play through one of the main story arcs (Jagal Arcs)
Outfit Customization - You will be able to change the wardrobe, so they can fight with the outfit that they’ll like.
Arena Mode - Test your skills in the arena by fighting waves of enemies.
Unlock Achievements and complete various challenges, including reaching specific ranks in the arena and other combat feats.

Any feedback would be really appreciated!
And don’t forget to wishlist our game!

Best Regards,
Eksil Team
